Class.Name: Duration
Class.Description: Triggers a signal every frame during the specified duration.

OutLatent.Name: Out
OutLatent.Description: Signaled every frame while the duration is active.

OutLatent.Name: Done
OutLatent.Description: Signaled once the duration is complete.

Property.Name: Duration
Property.Description: The time this node will remain active.

Property.Name: Elapsed
Property.Description: The amount of time that has elapsed since the countdown began.
